description: A representation of a promotional offers for vehicles.

Vehicle Launch.description: Whether the piece contains information about a newly revised vehicle or a totally new car which has been added to the manufacturerâ€™s line-up.

Offer Origin.description: The type of company that originated the offers.

Vehicle Representation.description: If multiple vehicles are promoted, set to Division Line-Up.

Vehicle.description: For each vehicles with an offer.

Offer Description.description: A brief text description of the offer

Offer Expiration.description: When does the promotional offer expire.

Offer Cash Allowance.description: If there is a cash back or rebate offer when buying a vehicle, how much ($)

Offer Loan Money Down.description: The amount of money the buyer will have to give a car dealer before securing financing on the balance of the car price. This may also be called a Down Payment.

Offer APR.description: The annual percentage rate (APR) for the loan and/or lease, expressed as a percentage. Sometimes referenced as 0% Financing, or offer APR.(%)

Offer Loan Term.description: If there is a loan offer on the vehicle, how many months?

Offer Loan Money Down.description: If there is a loan offer on the vehicle, how much down payment is required ($).

Purchase Discount.description: The dollar amount discounted from the Manufacturer Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). May also be referred to as Bonus Cash or Discount.

Leasing Discount.description: The dollar amount discounted from the Manufacturer Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). Leasing discount is a similar function to Cash Allowance, but the discount goes toward a vehicle lease, not a purchase.

Trade-In Allowance.description: The reduction in the price of a car, in dollars, that occurs when a previously owned car is used as collateral towards the purchase of a vehicle.

Vehicle Financing Type.description: If the piece includes financing options for either purchasing and/or leasing a vehicle: field should be either Lease or Loan.

Warranty.description: If there is a warranty being offered, how many miles and years.
